jbb.engine.pacman
Class Ghost

java.lang.Object
  jbb.engine.Tile
      jbb.engine.Avatar
          jbb.engine.NPC
              jbb.engine.pacman.Ghost

public class Ghost
extends NPC

The Ghost currently moves towards the position using the NPCs movement method. Later on, there will be three different ghost types, described in the USER GUIDE.

Author:
Jonathan Gravel
